definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about

sentences.english: Their testimony and cross-examination were uneventful.
sentences.chinese: 他们的作证和盘问是平淡无事的。

sentences.english: If you lack courage in love, your life will be colorless.
sentences.chinese: 一个在爱情中缺乏勇气的人，生活也会平淡无味。

sentences.english: Love the unexpected death, and of course we have insipid love.
sentences.chinese: 有至死不虞的爱，当然也有平淡的爱。

sentences.english: Is cold sky of light prologues, that mild eye Jing but all over undressed.
sentences.chinese: 冷天淡淡开口，那双平淡的眼精时而冒出精光。

sentences.english: They know the life is so costful , and an unromantic living with the true happiness.
sentences.chinese: 知道生命有多么宝贵，而一份平淡的生活就是幸福。

sentences.english: Only gold seemed to climb in an undramatic fashion to finish the day higher.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有黄金平淡无奇的方式到达更高值的一天。

sentences.english: In the light of together with happiness, just more precious.
sentences.chinese: 平平淡淡之中的携手与幸福，才更珍贵。

sentences.english: Where did a no-frills mother of four boys fit?
sentences.chinese: 哪里适合一个穿着平淡无奇的四个孩子的妈妈住宿呢？

sentences.english: A mixture of milk and water is a insipid drink.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶和水的混合物是平淡无味的饮料。

sentences.english: This is my vacation , nothing interesting.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我的假期，平淡无味。

sentences.english: Flat light and happiness into the work, all the more precious.
sentences.chinese: 平平淡淡之中的携手与幸福，才更珍贵。

sentences.english: Some readers might notice an air of listlessness emanating from LiS HQ this week.
sentences.chinese: 有些读者或许已经注意到了本星期栏目的平淡乏味。

sentences.english: This design project came with its challenges, as is often the case when transforming spaces from bland to beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 这个设计方案完成了从平淡到美丽的华丽转变。

sentences.english: Life is not straightforward, nothing out of the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 生活也是，不要平铺直叙，平淡无奇。

sentences.english: Lonely at night to see the stars, it will let you feel the United States Jingye insipid.
sentences.chinese: 寂寞时看看夜晚的繁星，它会让你感觉静夜平淡的美。

sentences.english: That may seem a distinctly unromantic prospect.
sentences.chinese: 这看起来是平淡无奇的景色。

definition: ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
